ValidationRule.description: Check if the Project Partner's region is same as the Project Region or not while 1st time creation of project
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(CT_Project_Partner__c)) && NOT(ISNULL(pse__Region__c)) , IF( pse__Region__c != CT_Project_Partner__r.Contact.pse__Region__c , true,false) ,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The region of Project Partner is different than the region selected on Project.
